Detailed Description

The OptMethod class represents the parent class for possible optimization methods. It has 2 successors: <1> Coordinate descent --- CoordinateDescent <2> Stohastic search --- StohasticSearch

Member Function Documentation

virtual double OptMethod::Optimize ( Area *  area,
Function *  func,
StopCriterion *  stopCrit,
int *  iter 
) [pure virtual]

The function Optimize responsible for stopping optimization.

Parameters:
area is the pointer to the function definition area
func is the pointer to the function
stopCrit is the pointer to the stop criterion
iter is the number of iterations
Returns:
minimum function value in this area
